wiki.category.cult.text: Teseh rae teh reslo in teh lctu reol set. Yb dteualf, msot loppee hiwt teseh reslo rae lctu asllitosy, lctu ssiiednr, nad rae prat of teh Lctu cerrhhayi.
wiki.category.fiends.text: Teseh rae teh reslo in teh isfend reol set. Yb dteualf, msot loppee hiwt teseh reslo rae isfend asllitosy nad ssiiednr.
wiki.category.modifiers.text: Teseh rae opontis tath can be bdleane ihcwh cnhaeg teh oavhiber of teh geam.
wiki.category.abilities.text: Iabelsiit rae how srlpeay rfprmeo sctonai in teh geam. To ees thwa sctonai yuo can do, ees teh iybailt enum. Teh Iybailt enum si ewerh teh tsroclno fro msot iabelsiit rae. Msot iabelsiit phnape ndigur teh tgnih, utb some iabelsiit phnape ndigur teh day.
wiki.category.strategies.text: Eerth rae a tlo of hllpuef atesrsgeti tath srlpeay sue in drero to elph hetm nwi. Ewn atesrsgeti rae ecaedrt eeyvr day.
wiki.article.standard.town.title: Tnwo
wiki.article.standard.town.text: Tnwo si teh nima odog anoiftc. Llyuaus, teh yaimjotr of teh srlpeay in caeh geam rae tnwo asllitosy. Ythe od'tn ttasr onwikgn who caeh eroht rae, ekilnu teh tedysnaci or teh lctu. Tnwo iwns yb iniitlamegn lla gnpspoio seamt (tedysnaci, lctu, oistrnas, wwerfelo, cet). Teh swieotn nede to okrw tegehrot to ndfi uto who teh lisve rae. Terhi nima rewop si in icootiunmmanc nad onvigt, so fi yuo rae a oewnti who dseo ont ucmeiamncto, yuo rae ont ipglehn uory tmea nwi.
wiki.article.standard.mafia.title: Tedysnaci Cerrhhayi
wiki.article.standard.mafia.text:
Teh tedysnaci cerrhhayi si teh mytsse ihcwh ekspe teh tedysnaci nibeg elba to klli eeyvr tgnih. Teh tedysnaci cerrhhayi si a cltooelicn of srlpeay who rae llyuaus osal tedysnaci ssiiednr nad tedysnaci asllitosy. Teh mytsse soolwlf tow ursel:
* Fi eerth si a Tedysnaci Ligklni reol in teh cerrhhayi - husc sa Tafrogedh or Torispmo - hewn ythe ide, oterhna mreebm of teh cerrhhayi will itnehri terhi reol.
* Fi eerth si on Tedysnaci Ligklni reol in teh cerrhhayi, a tedysnaci mreebm si viegn teh tedysnaci gun. Hewn teh epylra hiwt teh tedysnaci gun dise, oterhna mreebm of teh cerrhhayi irhients it.

Srlpeay tath rae in teh tedysnaci cerrhhayi ndet to osal be tedysnaci ssiiednr nad asllitosy. Siht mnsae ythe nwi yb iniitlamegn eeyvr eroht tmea nad can altk tegehrot ndigur tgnih nad rtuoayib.
wiki.article.standard.neutral.title: Nretula
wiki.article.standard.neutral.text: Lurntase rae ont lla on teh smae tmea. Caeh nretula reol sah sclpiea nwi oindinotsc. Msot of hetm rae tsaagni othb teh tnwo nad teh tedysnaci. Some nretula reslo can nwi beoref teh geam sdne ilek teh Strjee, Toarvlrioyneu, nad Amoresody.
wiki.article.standard.fiends.title: Isfend
wiki.article.standard.fiends.text: Isfend nwi yb iniitlamegn lla gnpspoio seamt. Isfend rae on teh smae tmea, utb ythe tan'c ucmeiamncto at tgnih. Isfend rae llyuaus vyre pwuoeflr nad can klli tuillepm srlpeay in noe tgnih. Ekilnu tedysnaci nad lctu, msot samge udhlos have at msot noe nefdi, in ontidadi to teh tnwo nad tedysnaci.
wiki.article.standard.cult.title: Lctu Cerrhhayi
wiki.article.standard.cult.text:
Teh lctu cerrhhayi si teh mytsse ihcwh ekspe teh lctu nibeg elba to triehe klli or rtvocen caeh tgnih. Teh lctu cerrhhayi si a cltooelicn of srlpeay who rae llyuaus osal lctu ssiiednr nad lctu asllitosy. Teh lctu cerrhhayi aaitimnns 2 iabelsiit, klli nad rtvocen. Ythe aenaetrlt, netcovring rftsi, nad ligklni trefa.
* Teh lctu can ylno klli trefa ythe have lfcuuclyesss edctnervo neomseo. Trefa tath, ythe can ylno rtvocen trefa lfcuuclyesss ligklni neomseo.
* Fi fro some oseran a klli or rtvocen od'sent okrw (e.g. teh rleilk/evrceonrt asw cblkoed), tehn teh smae iybailt si rtide agnai teh enxt tgnih - it od'sent itswch. Seabeuc of siht, ligklni/netcovring si ont nirtnhlyee "eeyvr eroht tgnih".

Teseh rae how teh lctu reslo tuexece teh isteud of teh lctu:
* Altospe: Teh lctu cerrhhayi gresnuaaet eerth si aslayw na altospe. Fi teh altospe dise, teh epylra who sah eben in teh lctu cerrhhayi teh lsntego bmocees teh altospe. Teh sepoat'sl iybailt si to rtvocen srlpeay, wrheveo fi eerth si on loztea, tehn teh altospe kslil.
* Ecidsipl: Teh ecidsipl sah on iybailt. A ecidsipl yam cbeeom na altospe fi teh altospe dise.
* Loztea: Teh epylra who sah eben in teh lctu cerrhhayi teh thsstero si teh ylno loztea. Fi eerth si a loztea, it will rfprmeo kislinlg rahter naht teh altospe.
wiki.article.standard.minions.title: Oisnmin
wiki.article.standard.minions.text:
Oisnmin si a Reol Set tath inctsoan reslo ihcwh nwi ylno fi tnwo sleos. Ythe rae ont yolal to yna ooclisncun. Ythe eealv teh geam fi lla terhi eneisme rae deda. Ythe enar't ssiiednr to yna pgrou, so ythe od'tn ucmeiamncto at tgnih.

Some Oisnmin diencul:
* Thicw
* Rcceoswar
* Aiprpkdne
* Waeprr
wiki.article.standard.whisper.title: Eprwihs
wiki.article.standard.whisper.text:
Ndigur teh day, sa gnol sa yuo can aespk in lla ahct, yuo can eprwihs to yna eroht iglvni epylra
- Pgrsiienhw sndse a rptieav ahct meesags to teh epylra yuo hceso
- To eprwihs neomseo, sue teh eprwihs cmomdna or pnoe teh eprwihs aenhlnc ngsui teh btoutn in teh srpltlayie
   - Teh eprwihs cmomdna si "\w#" ewerh "#" si epldcrae hiwt teh epylra erumbn of teh epylra yuo twna to eprwihs, so "\2w Hye, ym reol si thicw!" pwisrshe to epylra @2
- Hewn yuo eprwihs neomseo, a meesags si tens in lla ahct ignysa tath yuo eewpsidhr to teh epylra yuo hceso, so oerevyen wokns tath yuo eewpsidhr tath epylra
 - Yuo tan'c eprwihs to na freahdnncsei epylra
 - Fi yuo yrt to dens na ividlna eprwihs yuo rae tens a ahct meesags ignysa tath yuo tcna eprwihs.
wiki.article.standard.tag.title: Atg
wiki.article.standard.tag.text: Tgas rae ncosi ohnsw enxt to epylra menas in teh epylra enum. Tgas can be eddad or emvoerd yb some reslo. Tgas can owhs ifinaomrnot ilek who teh gdeforhsta pkcbua si, who si teh Toarvlrioyneu argett, who teh rcnaioitm sah agtdeg, cet. Srlpeay rae tdol hewn ythe gani nad leos tgas on eroht srlpeay.
wiki.article.standard.reveal.title: Veerla
wiki.article.standard.reveal.text:
- Hewn a epylra si vleeader to yuo, yuo can ees terhi reol beall, nad yuo rae viegn a meesags ignysa terhi reol
- Hewn a epylra si eelcdnoac frmo yuo, yuo leos terhi reol beall, nad rae viegn a ahct meesags ignysa ythe rae eelcdnoac romf yuo
    - A epylra egst eelcdnoac hewn ythe ide or itswch reslo.

 Rvelienga nad reol aselbl rae rptieav. so fi yuo ees a reol beall, srtheo higmt ont osal ees tath reol beall. Ssiiednr rae aslayw vleeader to caeh eroht. o_F_r A_lxpeme_ tedysnaci.
wiki.article.standard.roleLabel.title: Reol Beall
wiki.article.standard.roleLabel.text:
- Reol aselbl aeaprp enxt to epylra menas, it soshw thwa reol tath epylra si
- Reol aselbl rae ont aslayw iupbcl, fro lepexam, yuo can ees uory now reol beall at lla itmes, utb eroht srlpeay can ont
- A tedysnaci mreebm can ees teh eroht tedysnaci eremsmb reol aselbl
- Hewn yuo gani a reol beall on oterhna epylra, yuo egt a ahct meesags ignysa tath srlpeay reol asw vleeader to yuo
- Hewn yuo leos a reol beall on oterhna epylra, yuo egt a ahct meesags ignysa tath srlpeay reol asw eelcdnoac frmo yuo
- Fi a epylra tath si vleeader to yuo hcwsetis reslo or dise, terhi reol beall will be eelcdnoac
- Deda srlpeay can ont have reol aselbl, teh reol tath praapse enxt to terhi mean si tjus teh reol on terhi agrev. Teseh can be utenccraai fro nareoss ilek teh rcnaioitm or s'rofegr iybailt
wiki.article.standard.trial.title: Ratli
wiki.article.standard.trial.text:
Rltisa rae how srlpeay egt voted uto.
Rltisa rae trefa iossnducis nad beoref sukd.
Ratli spaseh go in siht drero
- Inonianotm
- Onimsetyt
- Ejetmudng
- Anilf Srdow

A epylra si ondmtaeni trefa ietggtn voted yb eorm naht fhal of teh iglvni srlpeay
Trefa nibeg ondmtaeni, ndigur onimsetyt, teh ondmtaeni epylra kstal on terhi now
Trefa onimsetyt, ndigur ejetmudng, oerevyen ovste tuylgi, coennnit, or ntsabasi. Fi eerth rae eorm tuylgi ovste naht coennnit ovste, teh geam esog to anilf srdow, itoherews it esog ackb to inonianotm
Ndigur anilf srdow, teh epylra who asw voted tuylgi yass some anilf srdow nad tehn si edecexut nad dise
Eerth can ylno be pu to 3 inonianotm spaseh rpe day. Fi 3 rltisa phnape nad on epylra si edecexut, sukd sartst
wiki.article.standard.interview.title: Iterewvin
wiki.article.standard.interview.text: A ertorrep can iterewvin a epylra ndigur teh tgnih, noalliwg teh ertorrep to aespk hiwt hetm. Teh epylra nibeg viiedtreewn yam ont wokn who teh ertorrep si, utb oerevyen wokns teh ertorrep si on teh tnwo tmea.
wiki.article.standard.report.title: Trreop
wiki.article.standard.report.text: Teh ertorrep sah a trreop ihcwh si eopdst ybiullcp eeyvr rtuoayib teh ertorrep cheooss to. Oerevyen wokns teh trreop asw tteinrw yb teh ertorrep so ythe wokn teh ifinaomrnot si owthtusyrrt. Teh ertorrep yam iterewvin a epylra caeh tgnih to gani ifinaomrnot to diencul in teh trreop.
wiki.article.standard.forged.title: Gofre
wiki.article.standard.forged.text: A epylra who si edrfog adh terhi iibla nad reol hgdcane yb teh frreog on terhi agrev.
wiki.article.standard.visit.title: Vitis
wiki.article.standard.visit.text:
Itsvis rae teh cero of teh geam
- Srlpeay can vitis eroht srlpeay to sue terhi iabelsiit
- Clpytlaiy, coinosgh a epylra hiwt a reol iybailt caseus yuo to vitis teh ohesnc epylra, altuhhog eerth rae nmya secixtneop
- Itsvis can oerts raext slfag husc sa "knitcaatg", siht mnsae it yam nrtiaetc hiwt catrnie reslo freyedtilfn

 Eerh rae some eaesplxm of how itsvis higmt okrw
- @7 si a Cedeeittv who cheooss @71, so @7 itsvis @71 nad erslna a sutrle tboau @71
 On teh smae tgnih @01 si a otoukol who osal cheooss @71. So @01 erslna tath @7 tvisdei terhi argett.
- Eerth si iitvnegla, who cheooss to toohs @30. At teh smae item, eerth si na irnneege who sah terhi rapt set on @30. Teh rseeginen rapt kslil teh iitvnegla seabeuc teh iitvnegla si gnsviiti @30 hiwt na knitcaatg vitis
- A itsvis argett can be hgdcane witothu teh tovsrii enev onwikgn, fro lepexam, teh iabelsiit of Prorrtatnse, Waeprr, nad Thicw aescu itsvis eatrsgt to cnhaeg.
wiki.article.standard.target.title: Argett
wiki.article.standard.target.text:
Uory argett si teh epylra who yuo vitis.
- A vitis naeigttrg neomseo mnsae tath teh tovsrii si gnsviiti tath epylra
wiki.article.standard.indirect.title: Tniedcir
wiki.article.standard.indirect.text:
Na tniedcir iybailt si noe tath dseo ont vitis. Eeeotrrfh, it si nuebla to be seen yb a otoukol or akrterc or ctffeaed yb nmya eroht iabelsiit._Orf _pamlxee:
- Fi a mmkanars aactstk a epylra hiwt teh rseeginen rapt on hetm, sa gnol sa teh mmkanars dseo ont vitis teh trpdeap epylra, teh rapt t'nsi set off, enev hewn teh eadkmr epylra si tacedkat. Siht si seabeuc teh ckttaa si tniedcir.
wiki.article.standard.hypnotize.title: Othzipyen
wiki.article.standard.hypnotize.text: A epylra who si ytpehoznid asw a tisntphyso argett. Ythe letpyolnita rae tdol a feka meesags frmo teh oypinshtt. Ythe yam have eben ockldeoerbl.
wiki.article.standard.frame.title: Mrfae
wiki.article.standard.frame.text: A epylra who si efmrad asw a mfresar argett.
wiki.article.standard.convert.title: Rtvocen
wiki.article.standard.convert.text:
A apresly' reol si hgdcane. Lla of terhi iybailt sseu rae fedellir to xmumaim. _Orf Lepexam:_
- Fi neomseo si edctnervo to a Eraevtn, ythe egt lla erhet iybailt sseu.
- Na Altospe can rtvocen srlpeay ntoi tlissctu.
wiki.article.standard.roleblock.title: Eorokbllc
wiki.article.standard.roleblock.text: A epylra who si ockldeoerbl sah terhi itsvis sdaree. A apresly' itsvis nibeg sdaree oeftn mnsae ythe tan'c sue terhi iybailt. Some reslo rae mmeuni or ont ctffeaed yb nibeg ockldeoerbl. Toecrs nad Oypinshtt rae reslo tath can eorokbllc eroht srlpeay nad rae othb mmeuni to nibeg ockldeoerbl.
wiki.article.standard.ward.title: Adwr
wiki.article.standard.ward.text:
Neomseo can be aderwd. Nnoyae who itsvis a epylra who si aderwd sah lla terhi itsvis sdaree nad ceisveer a ahct meesags ignysa tath ythe rae wokcddabler. _Orf _pamlxee:
- A ruoecbn teclsse a epylra to adwr caeh tgnih
- Teh jarilo utsp a epylra in jlai, ridwagn hetm.

 Some reslo rae rlwkdcaob mmeuni
- A strjee can klli neomseo enev fi yee'hrt aderwd
wiki.article.standard.block.title: Bcokl
wiki.article.standard.block.text: A epylra who si cblkoed asw triehe ockldeoerbl, wokcddabler, or othb. A epylra t'nsi cblkoed fi yee'hrt mmeuni
wiki.article.standard.jail.title: Jlai
wiki.article.standard.jail.text: A Jarilo can utp a epylra in jlai. Hewn a epylra si in jlai, ythe can altk hiwt teh Jarilo at tgnih, teh Jarilo can choseo to tuexece hetm, ythe tan'c tlcese nnoyae. Teh iejadl epylra si aderwd, so msot iabelsiit nacgti on hetm lfai, agmeinn terhi afse frmo msot aactstk or eatgiviosntins.
wiki.article.standard.rampage.title: Argpmae
wiki.article.standard.rampage.text: Lla sstiovir to a emgrpaad epylra rae tciyrnleid tacedkat. Teh argpmae srashe teh ckttaa llvee of teh gnimpagra cacatrerh.
wiki.article.standard.possess.title: Ospesss
wiki.article.standard.possess.text:
A epylra who si edspessos asw edcofr ntoi gnsviiti neomseo.
- Reslo ilek Thicw, nad Nuseribrttiiot, have teh iybailt to ospesss srlpeay
- Some reslo rae mmeuni to nibeg edspessos, ilek thicw, nad nuseribrttiiot
- Fi a reol itsvis tuillepm loppee, ylno teh rftsi vitis si hgdcane hewn edspessos
- Yuo tan'c be edspessos ntoi neomseo fi uory reol od'sent woall yuo to tlcese hetm. Fi a mdimue si edspessos, ythe llsit od'tn vitis nnoyae

o_F_r A_lxpeme_:

@1 teh iitvnegla teclsse @7 in oshep of othiongs hetm.
Hewn tgnih sdne @1 egst a meesags ignysa ythe erwe edspessos.
Teh enxt rtuoayib, ythe ees tath @2 asw stoh stdaeni.
Siht si seabeuc @4 si teh thicw, who edspessos @1 ntoi othiongs @2.

o_F_r A_lxpeme_:

Teh rsoiohlpehp teclsse @8 nad @12, utb ythe rae edspessos ntoi @51
Teh rsoiohlpehp lacluayt tvisdei @51 nad @12, ylno teh rftsi vitis asw hgdcane
wiki.article.standard.defense.title: Neefsde
wiki.article.standard.defense.text:
Aactstk nad neefsde have 3 irtes caeh. Na ckttaa can triehe be scbai, gecrornmirpa-i, or pgictier-epnnotirco.

A neefsde can triehe be drormea, tcdptereo, or iivbneciln.

A scbai ckttaa can ont klli a epylra who si drormea, nad na gecrornmirpa-i ckttaa can ont klli a epylra who si tcdptereo. A pgictier-epnnotirco ckttaa can oworrpeve aormr sa llwe sa oetcintopr.

 Some reslo have aormr yb dteualf, llyuaus vlie neso. Oetcintopr can be rangdet to srlpeay rhtugoh iabelsiit ilek teh Roc'dsot iybailt to retotcp terhi argett. A epylra hiwt iivbneciln neefsde can ylno ide yb ietggtn edecexut or laveing teh geam.

Lussen itoherews iidtnedac, aactstk rae scbai yb dteualf nad will ont be elba to klli srlpeay who rae drormea or tcdptereo. Tniedcir si ont a iter of ckttaa.
wiki.article.standard.protect.title: Retotcp
wiki.article.standard.protect.text: Retotcp mnsae to ecnasrie onseosm'e neefsde to tcdptereo. Teh oetcintopr will ylno lsat teh tgnih lussen itoherews iidtnedac. A tcdptereo epylra si tdol hewn ythe rae tacedkat utb asevd yb oetcintopr
wiki.article.standard.dead.title: Deda
wiki.article.standard.dead.text: Fi a epylra si deda, ythe tan'c oevt, terhi agrev will ykllei be in teh arardygve, nad ythe llyuaus tan'c sue terhi iybailt ayomren. Deda srlpeay can ylno aespk hiwt eroht deda srlpeay hiwt teh eocnipxet of teh Mdimue nad tsi argett. A epylra sedne to ide to cbeeom deda. Lla srlpeay ttasr teh geam aivle! (Thwa ddi yuo eectpx…)
wiki.article.standard.silenced.title: Cenlesi
wiki.article.standard.silenced.text:
A epylra who si ecildnes can ont altk or itoherews ucmeiamncto ndigur tath day.
- Ythe tan'c ainenotm ndigur teh inonianotm spahe seabeuc ythe rae edcofr to freofti terhi oevt
- Ythe can llsit oevt ndigur teh ejetmudng spahe
- Fi teh ecildnes epylra si utp on ratli, ythe llsit tan'c altk
- Fi teh srlpeay rae lgknati uto udol, ecildnes srlpeay udhlos ont aespk or sue yna epyt of icootiunmmanc, inlnidcug ngsials or aifacl xissspnoree. Teh lreu si, of a epylra tan'c sue ahct, ythe rae ont lweldoa to ucmeiamncto
- Reslo ilek tyepud aomry nad jarilo can llsit sue terhi iabelsiit layrmlon ndigur teh day enev fi ecildnes

 A Rmeaciabllk can cenlesi a epylra caeh tgnih.
wiki.article.standard.friends.title: Ifdenrs
wiki.article.standard.friends.text:
Fi 2 srlpeay can nwi teh smae geam, ythe rae ifdenrs.
 - A strjee can nwi in teh smae geam sa a cedeeittv, so ythe rae ifdenrs
- Na Altospe can nwi in teh smae geam sa a ecidsipl so ythe rae ifdenrs
- A tafrogedh tan'c nwi in teh smae geam sa a cedeeittv, ythe othb nede teh eroht to leos, so ythe rae eneisme
- A noertmitea si ifdenrs hiwt a ruppeptee nad eneisme hiwt a mdimue
 Teh rsoiohlpehp, cedeeittv, nad ossigp, can sue terhi iabelsiit to ees fi loppee rae ifdenrs or eneisme, altuhhog asura can tefecf teseh rtlessu.

 A epylra can osal be ifdenrs hiwt ussocincnol. Fi yuo can nwi hiwt tnwo tehn yuo rae ifdenrs hiwt tnwo, fro lepexam, a cedeeittv si ifdenrs hiwt tnwo utb eneisme hiwt tedysnaci.
wiki.article.standard.enemies.title: Eneisme
wiki.article.standard.enemies.text:
Fi 2 srlpeay nede teh eroht to leos in drero fro elestvemhs to nwi, ythe rae eneisme.
- A Initlipoac tan'c nwi isdlegaon a aomry, so ythe rae eneisme.
- A tafrogedh tan'c nwi in teh smae geam sa a jarilo, so ythe rae eneisme.
- A strjee can nwi in teh smae geam sa a cedeeittv, so ythe rae ifdenrs.
- Na Altospe tan'c nwi hiwt a tafrogedh, so ythe rae eneisme.

 Teh rsoiohlpehp, cedeeittv, nad ossigp, can sue terhi iabelsiit to ees fi loppee rae ifdenrs or eneisme, altuhhog asura can tefecf teseh rtlessu.
wiki.article.standard.loyalist.title: Ilysolta
wiki.article.standard.loyalist.text:
A epylra who si a ilysolta iwns fi nad ylno fi teh ooclisncun terhi yolal to si eardche.
 - A Cedeeittv si llyuaus a tnwo ilysolta
 -  A Strjee si llyuaus ont yolal to yna nwi inodciton, terhi nwi inodciton si idpetednnne, (Enev fi ythe rae ifdenrs hiwt tnwo, ythe enar't a tnwo ilysolta).

 Srlpeay who rae yolal to nderfeift ussocincnol usmt be eneisme.
 Srlpeay can ylno be yolal to geam ussocincnol

# Tgnih
Msot reol iabelsiit okrw at tgnih. Eerh rae some eaesplxm

- Caeh tgnih, teh emrraf can tlcese a epylra to emak hetm srtregie lesylfa to teh cedeeittv. So a oewnti cdoul srtregie sa sipsuicsuo to a cedeeittv lesylfa fi a emrraf desu terhi iybailt

# Rtuoayib

Srlpeay will sak caeh eroht to lciam, siht mnsae ythe twna to wokn teh ifinaomrnot tath teh eroht epylra rneadle
Msot srlpeay dens terhi iibla in ahct ndigur siht spahe, to rehas teh ifinaomrnot fftniieylce in serpsoen to nibeg seadk to lciam. It will ykllei be eeodrcnisd sipsuicsuo to ont have na iibla apdrpere hewn seadk fro noe. So tsi vyre atimnropt to have noe apdrpere, on mretta who yuo rae

# Inonianotm

Teh bste awy fro swieotn to klli tedysnaci eremsmb si to sue terhi oevt, enev fi yuo enar’t catrnie neomseo si vlie, onvigt hetm oont ratli nad nertanhtgie hetm will oeftn igev ifinaomrnot to elph ndfi tedysnaci

Teh hdtiinmg mnalua sah a ltsi of lla reslo nad terhi iabelsiit. It si cmenmrdoede to rdea pu on uory reol ndigur teh gibnienng eirigbfn spahe

wiki.article.role.disciple.guide:
- Fi na Altospe dise, nad yuo rae teh enxt ltoeds ltcuits, yuo rae edctnervo to na Altospe
    - Ltoeds ltcuits mnsae tath yuo erwe a ltcuits beoref yna eroht epylra asw, nad fi eerth si a iet, tehn teh epylra hiwt a wleor epylra erumbn si teh ltoeds

Enev hogtuh yuo have on iybailt yuo rae tasenlsie to uory tmea. Yuo udhlos eil nad ucmeiamncto hiwt llewfo tlissctu to invnecoc teh tnwo to tuexece neomseo who t'nsi a ltcuits.
